root.name: Skiing
root.description: GameplayIn Skiing, you move you character left and right to try to avoid obstacles such as trees and bumps. The goal of the game is to reach the bottom as quickly as possible. There is also a slalom mode, in which you must reach the bottom as quickly as possible while going through a series of gates. While the game box boasted of authentic simulated sounds, in reality it sounded more like tuning a radio.
